document_data.mainbody:
Idalia Golddust was a Sembite adventurer and co-leader of the Company of Night in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
In , Idalia and Iona Waukeenservant attended a party at Thistleflame Keep, held by Lord Partic Thistle for King Azoun IVs birthday. They were interviewed as suspects after Lord Thistle appeared to be murdered at the party, but were not involved and knew nothing of it.
